div.p: A carry over from the TEI, DOCAUTHOR is an element that contains the name of the author of the document at hand. It is contained within the fileDesc--titleStmt area of the ORLANDOHEADER. It contains no sub-elements or unique attributes. It is currently not used, because the Orlando Project has implemented a much more robust method of tracking document responsibility through its responsibility element. Do not use this element unless otherwise instructed.
